---
layout: page
type: page-styleguide-components
title: Thumbnails
excerpt: Extend the gird system with the thumbnail component to easily display grids of images, videos, text, and more.
---

## Default

By default, thumbnails are designed to showcase linked images with minimal required markup.

{% example html %}
<div class="row">
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-md-3">
        <a href="#" class="thumbnail">
          <img data-src="holder.js/100%x180" alt="100%x180" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true" style="height: 180px; width: 100%; display: block;">
        </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-md-3">
        <a href="#" class="thumbnail">
          <img data-src="holder.js/100%x180" alt="100%x180" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true" style="height: 180px; width: 100%; display: block;">
        </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-md-3">
        <a href="#" class="thumbnail">
          <img data-src="holder.js/100%x180" alt="100%x180" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true" style="height: 180px; width: 100%; display: block;">
        </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-6 col-md-3">
        <a href="#" class="thumbnail">
          <img data-src="holder.js/100%x180" alt="100%x180" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true" style="height: 180px; width: 100%; display: block;">
        </a>
      </div>
    </div>
{% endexample %}
